cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joushi

sentence.kanji: 上司に相談してみます。
sentence.romaji: joushi ni soudan shite mimasu

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shikai

sentence.kanji: 彼は司会が上手ですね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shikai ga jouzu desu ne

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kau

sentence.kanji: ペットを飼ったことはありますか。
sentence.romaji: peto wo kata koto ha arimasu ka
sentence.english: Have you ever had a pet?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kodoku

sentence.kanji: 彼は孤独な人生を送っていたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kodoku na jinsei wo okute ita n da

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kako

sentence.kanji: 括弧の部分は省略できます。
sentence.romaji: kako no bubun ha shouryaku dekimasu
sentence.english: The part in parentheses can be omitted.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ukagau

sentence.kanji: お話しを伺いたいのですが。
sentence.romaji: ohanashi wo ukagaitai no desu ga
sentence.english: I want to hear your story.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's habatsu

sentence.kanji: あの大学には派閥がたくさんあります。
sentence.romaji: ano daigaku ni ha habatsu ga takusan arimasu
sentence.english: There are a lot of factions at that university.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sanmyaku

sentence.kanji: 列車の窓から雄大な山脈が見えたんだよ。
sentence.romaji: resha no mado kara yuudai na sanmyaku ga mieta n da yo
sentence.english: I was able to see a magnificent mountain range from the window of the train.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mujun

sentence.kanji: 彼の言っていることは矛盾しています。
sentence.romaji: kare no ite iru koto ha mujun shite imasu

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ipanni

sentence.kanji: 一般に老人は早起きです。
sentence.romaji: ipanni roujin ha hayaoki desu
sentence.english: In general, elderly people get up early.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koushuu

sentence.kanji: 彼は公衆電話を探したの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha koushuu denwa wo sagashita no
sentence.english: He looked for a public phone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuugiin

sentence.kanji: 予算案が衆議院を通過したな。
sentence.romaji: yosanan ga shuugiin wo tsuuka shita na
sentence.english: The budget proposal passed the House of Representatives.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanshuu

sentence.kanji: スタジアムは観衆で満員だったよ。
sentence.romaji: sutajiamu ha kanshuu de manin data yo
sentence.english: The stadium was full of spectators.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gunshuu

sentence.kanji: 彼はマイクで群衆に話しかけたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha maiku de gunshuu ni hanashikaketa n da
sentence.english: He spoke to the masses through a microphone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taishuu

sentence.kanji: 能は元々大衆の文化でした。
sentence.romaji: nou ha motomoto taishuu no bunka deshita
sentence.english: Noh drama was originally the culture of the masses.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genki

sentence.kanji: おかげさまで元気です。
sentence.romaji: okagesama de genki desu

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tenki

sentence.kanji: 今日はいい天気ですね。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha ii tenki desu ne

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kimochi

sentence.kanji: 彼の気持ちが分からない。
sentence.romaji: kare no kimochi ga wakaranai

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dekiru

sentence.kanji: 彼女はイタリア語が出来ます。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha itariago ga dekimasu

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuru

sentence.kanji: 彼は昼過ぎに来ます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha hirusugi ni kimasu

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ki

sentence.kanji: 彼は意外に気が小さい。
sentence.romaji: kare ha igai ni ki ga chiisai

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikouki

sentence.kanji: 息子は飛行機のおもちゃが好きです。
sentence.romaji: musuko ha hikouki no omocha ga suki desu

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rainen

sentence.kanji: 来年一緒に旅行しましょう。
sentence.romaji: rainen isho ni ryokou shimashou

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuma

sentence.kanji: 今日は妻の誕生日だ。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha tsuma no tanjoubi da

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tobu

sentence.kanji: 鳥が飛んでいます。
sentence.romaji: tori ga tonde imasu

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's byouki

sentence.kanji: 祖父が病気になった。
sentence.romaji: sofu ga byouki ni nata

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuuki

sentence.kanji: ここは空気がきれいです。
sentence.romaji: koko ha kuuki ga kirei desu

cards.english: popularity, temperament of the people, business conditions
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ninki

sentence.kanji: このバンドはとても人気があるよ。
sentence.romaji: kono bando ha totemo ninki ga aru yo

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's denki

sentence.kanji: 電気をつけてください。
sentence.romaji: denki wotsuketekudasai

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kion

sentence.kanji: 今日の気温は26度です。
sentence.romaji: kyou no kion ha nijuurokudo desu

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's motekuru

sentence.kanji: そのいすを持って来てください。
sentence.romaji: sono isu wo mote kite kudasai

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's raigetsu

sentence.kanji: 来月から大学生になります。
sentence.romaji: raigetsu kara daigakusei ni narimasu
sentence.english: I'll be a college student beginning next month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tenkiyohou

sentence.kanji: 明日の天気予報は雨です。
sentence.romaji: ashita no tenkiyohou ha ame desu

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omoshiroi

sentence.kanji: この本は全然面白くなかった。
sentence.romaji: kono hon ha zenzen omoshiroku nakata
sentence.english: This book wasn't interesting at all.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's majime

sentence.kanji: 彼は真面目な人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha majime na hito desu

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikoujou

sentence.kanji: バスが飛行場に着きました。
sentence.romaji: basu ga hikoujou ni tsukimashita
sentence.english: The bus arrived at the airport.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuretekuru

sentence.kanji: 息子が友達を連れて来ました。
sentence.romaji: musuko ga tomodachi wo tsurete kimashita

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's raishuu

sentence.kanji: 続きは来週やりましょう。
sentence.romaji: tsuzuki ha raishuu yarimashou

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaikaku

sentence.kanji: 彼は行政を改革したいと思っている。
sentence.romaji: kare ha gyousei wo kaikaku shitai to omote iru
sentence.english: He wants to reform the administration.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kawa

sentence.kanji: 革のベルトを買いました。
sentence.romaji: kawa no beruto wo kaimashita

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juurai

sentence.kanji: このプリンターは従来のものより速い。
sentence.romaji: kono purinta- ha juurai no mono yori hayai
sentence.english: This printer prints faster than previous models.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senmenjo

sentence.kanji: 洗面所で顔を洗った。
sentence.romaji: senmenjo de kao wo arata
sentence.english: She washed her face in the lavatory.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shizumu

sentence.kanji: ボートが川に沈んだ。
sentence.romaji: bo-to ga kawa ni shizunda
sentence.english: The boat sank in the river.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hima

sentence.kanji: 明日は暇ですか。
sentence.romaji: ashita ha hima desu ka

cards.english: take care of, pay attention to
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiwotsukeru

sentence.kanji: 体に気を付けてください。
sentence.romaji: karada ni ki wo tsukete kudasai

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mirai

sentence.kanji: 未来は誰にも分からない。
sentence.romaji: mirai ha dare ni mo wakaranai

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sarainen

sentence.kanji: 次のオリンピックは再来年です。
sentence.romaji: tsugi no orinpiku ha sarainen desu
sentence.english: The next Olympics are the year after next.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saraigetsu

sentence.kanji: 再来月まで予約で一杯です。
sentence.romaji: saraigetsu made yoyaku de ipai desu
sentence.english: They're fully booked until the month after the next.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saraishuu

sentence.kanji: 再来週は忙しいです。
sentence.romaji: saraishuu ha isogashii desu
sentence.english: I'll be busy the week after next.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koe

sentence.kanji: 彼は大きな声で話した。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ooki na koe de hanashita

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiku

sentence.kanji: 生まれて初めて布団を敷いた。
sentence.romaji: umarete hajimete futon wo shiita
sentence.english: I laid out the futon for the first time in my life.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's makura

sentence.kanji: 私は低い枕が好きです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha hikui makura ga suki desu
